sentences.en: He built a fire with fag ( g ) ots.
sentences.cn: 他用一把把的柴禾生着了火.

sentences.en: He never had much confidence in his judgement at the fag-end of the working day.
sentences.cn: 到了快下班的百无聊赖的时候，他对自己的判断力从未有过信心。

sentences.en: He only heard the fag - end of their conversation.
sentences.cn: 他只听到他们交谈中无足轻重的部分.

sentences.en: I am happy enough to pay my respects to Streep, who even came out into the garden for a quick fag with us, but pay respect to the woman she portrays?
sentences.cn: 我很高兴向斯特里普表示我的尊敬，她甚至在快节奏的劳累之后，还跟我们一起出现在花园里，可是，是向她所饰演的角色表示尊敬吗？

sentences.en: I only caught the fag end of their conversation.
sentences.cn: 我仅听到他们谈话的结尾。

sentences.en: I've got to tidy my room. What a fag!
sentences.cn: 我得整理自己的房间. 真是累人的事.

sentences.en: In this article, the spindle units made by FAG ( Germany ) and SKF ( Sweden ) are introduced.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了德国 FAG 和瑞典SKF公司的主轴单元.

sentences.en: It is too much of a fag.
It's too much of a fag.
sentences.cn: 那是叫人受不了的苦工.

sentences.en: Let me help with your kit - bag; you might fag your - self out!
sentences.cn: 我来帮你拿工具袋吧; 你要累坏了!

sentences.en: Old George, as usual, got the fag end of the deal.
sentences.cn: 老乔治像往常一样在那笔交易中又吃了亏.

sentences.en: She fag ( g ) oted all the newspapers together.
sentences.cn: 她把所有的报纸都捆在一起.

sentences.en: This kind of climbing will not fag out our well - trained mountaineers.
sentences.cn: 这种攀登不会累倒我们训练有素的登山队员.

sentences.en: This one blacked his shoes, that toasted his bread, others would fag out.
sentences.cn: 有的替他擦鞋, 有的替他烤面包, 有的做小打杂.

sentences.en: This sort of work fag ged me out.
sentences.cn: 这种工作使我疲惫不堪.

sentences.en: Too much trouble to fag up the stairs to the landing.
sentences.cn: 吃力地爬上楼梯到平台那儿去,可太麻烦了.

words.tran_cn: 使劳累，努力地工作（fag的过去式和过去分词形式）

trans.tran_en: to become or cause to become exhausted by hard toil or work
